    • Property Detail

      • file

        public javafx.beans.property.StringProperty fileProperty
        Returns file path This function returns the file path as a StringProperty. It appends "file:" to the front so that it can be used to create images.

    • Field Detail

      • img

        public java.io.File img
        A Buffered img containing the name of the album.

      • caption

        public java.lang.String caption
        An integer representing how many photos are in this album.

      • dateCreated

        public java.time.LocalDate dateCreated
        A LocalDate object representing the date this album was created.

      • tags

        public java.util.Hashtable<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> tags
        A ArrayList of Strings to represent Tag values

    • Constructor Detail

      • Photo

        public Photo(java.lang.String caption,
             java.io.File file)
        A constructor. This constructor creates an Album object with the given name. It automatically sets the photoCount to 0 and the dateCreated to the current date.
        Parameters:
        caption - The username this user object has.
        file - The string of a filename for a file of a photo this user object has.

    • Method Detail

      • getCaption

        public javafx.beans.property.StringProperty getCaption()
        Returns Caption of this photo This function returns caption currently attached to this photo as a StringProperty.
        Returns:
        Caption created as a StringProperty

      • getDateCreated

        public javafx.beans.property.StringProperty getDateCreated()
        Returns date created This function returns the local date as a StringProperty. First, the date is formatted as MM/dd/yyyy, then is returned as a StringProperty object.
        Returns:
        Date created as a StringProperty

      • fileProperty

        public javafx.beans.property.StringProperty fileProperty()
        Returns file path This function returns the file path as a StringProperty. It appends "file:" to the front so that it can be used to create images.

      • addTag

        public void addTag(java.lang.String tagName,
                   java.lang.String tagValue)
        Adds a String tag to this photo's tag Hashtable. This function adds a given tag to the Photo's Hashtable of Tags. This is done after the photo is created from the menu.
        Parameters:
        tagName - Tag type to be added to the photo
        tagValue - Tag name to be added to the photo

      • removeTag

        public void removeTag(java.lang.String tagName)
        Removes a String tag from this photo's tag ArrayList. This function removes a given tag from the Photo's Hashtable of Tags. This is done after the photo is created from the menu.
        Parameters:
        tagName - Tag type to be removed from the photo

      • getTags

        public javafx.beans.property.StringProperty getTags()
        Returns all tags of this photo. Turns the ArrayList of tags into a StringProperty so that it can be used in javafx table columns. All tags are separated by commas. If there are no tags, then an empty StringProperty is returned.
        Returns:
        List of tags as a StringProperty

      • getStringTags

        public java.lang.String getStringTags()
        Returns the list of tags as a single string. Returns all of the tags of the photo with proper formating for use in the tagColumn.
        Returns:
        Formatted String of all of the tags of the photo.
